Package org.cyclops.integratedterminals.api.terminalstorage.crafting

Interface ITerminalStorageTabIngredientCraftingHandler<O extends ITerminalCraftingOption<?>,I>

Type Parameters:
O - The type of crafting option.
I - The type of crafting plan identifier.
All Known Implementing Classes:
TerminalStorageTabIngredientCraftingHandlerCraftingNetwork
public interface ITerminalStorageTabIngredientCraftingHandler<O extends ITerminalCraftingOption<?>,I>
Handles crafting actions inside ingredient-based terminal storage tabs.

    • deserializeCraftingOption

      <T, M> O deserializeCraftingOption(org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.ingredient.IngredientComponent<T,M> ingredientComponent, net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundTag tag) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Deserialize a crafting option from NBT.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The instance type.
      M - The matching condition parameter.
      Parameters:
      ingredientComponent - The ingredient component for the crafting option.
      tag - An NBT tag representing a crafting option.
      Returns:
      A crafting option.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the given tag was invalid.

    • calculateCraftingPlan

      ITerminalCraftingPlan<I> calculateCraftingPlan(org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.api.network.INetwork network, int channel, ITerminalCraftingOption craftingOption, long quantity)
      Calculate a crafting plan for the given crafting option.
      Parameters:
      network - The network in which the plan should be calculated.
      channel - The channel to get the options for.
      craftingOption - A crafting option.
      quantity - The requested output quantity.
      Returns:
      The calculated crafting plan.

    • startCraftingJob

      void startCraftingJob(org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.api.network.INetwork network, int channel, ITerminalCraftingPlan<I> craftingPlan, net.minecraft.server.level.ServerPlayer player) throws CraftingJobStartException
      Start a crafting job.
      Parameters:
      network - The network in which the plan should be started.
      channel - The channel to get the options for.
      craftingPlan - A crafting plan.
      player - The player that started the crafting job.
      Throws:
      CraftingJobStartException - If the crafting job failed to start.

      Returns:

      Get the crafting job with the given id.
      Parameters:
      network - The network in which the plan should be started.
      channel - The channel to get the options for.
      craftingJobId - A crafting job id.
      Returns:

    • cancelCraftingJob

      boolean cancelCraftingJob(org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.api.network.INetwork network, int channel, I craftingJobId)
      Cancel the crafting job with the given id.
      Parameters:
      network - The network in which the plan should be started.
      channel - The channel to get the options for.
      craftingJobId - A crafting job id.
      Returns:
